nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 89, with temperatures falling to around 83 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 76. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Friday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 7am and 10am, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 87 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 76. Southeast wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
